fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: Press Freedom, Media Pluralism, Copyright, Freedom of the digital press, Digital agenda, Data protection, Taxes (e.g. VAT), Competition, Advertising freedom
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Verbandes der Zeitschriftenverlage Nord e.V.: http://www.vzvnord.de/
goals__remit: Bauer Media Group has a global presence spanning 19 countries on four continents, tapping into new markets and collaborating across borders. As a family-owned company Bauer Media Group is independent, fast and flexible. Bauer Media Group is growing in both the classical magazine business as well as the digital and radio sectors: with over 600 magazines worldwide, more than 400 digital media and over 100 radio- and tv-stations. The global turnover was 2.3 billion EUR in 2014.
